author: kevin
msg: * subversion/libsvn_client/log.c (svn_client_log): Send an empty path if
svn_path_condense_targets determines that only a single path was given.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/log.c (dav_svn__log_report): Accept a NULL path entry.
This signifies that we specified a path, but it is the same as the path where
the operation is rooted.

author: gstein
msg: Move a bunch of the svn_fs_id_t APIs to private FS APIs. The end goal
is to reduce the public reliance on the Node IDs in preparation for
changing their internal/underlying structure.
* include/svn_fs.h (svn_fs_id_length, svn_fs_id_eq,
svn_fs_id_is_ancestor, svn_fs_is_parent, svn_fs_copy_id,
svn_fs_predecessor_id): removed. these were all renamed and
moved to libsvn_fs/id.h.
(svn_fs_txn_path_is_id): new function to see whether a path in a
transaction is a specified node (id). this new function is used by
mod_dav_svn for early out-of-date detection.
* libsvn_fs/id.h: moved/renamed a bunch of functions from svn_fs.h
(svn_fs__id_eq): renamed from svn_fs_id_eq
(svn_fs__id_length): renamed from svn_fs_id_length
(svn_fs__id_predecessor): renamed from svn_fs_predecessor_id
(svn_fs__id_is_ancestor): renamed from svn_fs_id_is_ancestor
(svn_fs__id_copy): renamed from svn_fs_copy_id
(svn_fs__id_is_parent): renamed from svn_fs_is_parent
CHANGED ALL CALLERS
* libsvn_fs/id.c: updated functions to new names
(svn_fs__id_copy): use apr_pmemdup() to simplify things
* libsvn_fs/tree.c: updated functions to new names
(svn_fs_txn_path_is_id): new function. reports whether a path in a
txn root matches a specified node ID. this function can be used to
do a pre-flight conflict test (if you have a node id for the base
of what you're trying to change). this code originated in
mod_dav_svn.c/version.c::dav_svn_checkout() with changes to the
new function names and revised comments for the modified semantics.
* mod_dav_svn/version.c (dav_svn_checkout): factored out code which
moved to become svn_fs_txn_path_is_id() and now call it. update
all comments to reflect the modified semantics.
* libsvn_fs/dag.c: updated functions to new names
* libsvn_fs/nodes-table.c: updated functions to new names
* libsvn_fs/txn-table.c: updated functions to new names
* libsvn_fs/deltify.c: updated functions to new names
* tests/libsvn_fs/fs-test.c: updated functions to new names

author: rooneg
msg: * packages/freebsd/subversion/files/patch-configure
patch for configure to keep us from trying to use libneon.la when linking
against the external neon.

author: rooneg
msg: * packages/freebsd/subversion/Makefile
depend on neon.19, not neon.18.  remove the hack to work around the lack of
libneon.la, as the problem has been corrected in the latest version of the
neon port.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * subversion/bindings/swig/util.i: Change apr_ansi_time_to_apr_time to
apr_time_ansi_put.
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py (get_metadata): Change apr_ansi_time_to_apr_time
to apr_time_ansi_put.
Patch by: Daniel Berlin  <dan@dberlin.org>
Review by: me
